data.title: Currency MUR Mauritius Island [Mauritian rupee]
data.text:
Other currency selection:

Currency

Currency details MUR Mauritius Island [Mauritian rupee]

Label of currency MUR is Mauritian rupee.

Currency code MUR is associated to Mauritius Island, flag is used on this site for it.

Amounts in this currency have up to 2 decimals.

It is mainly associated to country or zone Mauritius.

Currency code MUR is a 3 letter normalized code according to standard ISO-4217, the 2 first letters are the code of the issuing country, third letter is the initial of the currency.

We recorded price on this currency since 1960-01-01

List of countries that are using or were using currency MUR :
